name: ifpimpda
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: sylanbrc(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3), wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3))
stmt.pretty: sylanbrc(w0, if(w1, w2, w3), (w1 → w2), (¬ w1 → w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w3))
-| wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w3))
-| wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))

|- wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w3))
-| wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w3))
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(w1)), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3))
-| wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(w1)), w3)

body.origin: |- wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(w1)), w3)

comment: Separation of the values of the conditional operator for propositions. (Contributed by AV, 30-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 27-Feb-2021.)
